title: Sink the Bismarck
description: Sink the Bismarck!March 18, 1941Hitler's proudest, deadliest battleship, the Bismarck, made ready to sail into the crowded shipping lanes of the North Atlantic. There was no ship in the British Navy that could face it in single combat. There was no liner fast enough to escape it.Against incredible odds, the British Navy set out to hunt down the ship that could change the course of World War II...C.S. Forester, the creator of the immortal "Hornblower", spent months of research before he wrote this book. It is clear, dramatic, fast-paced and full of suspense. It is one of the greatest stories of the British Navy.
author: C.S. Forester
